dtn.net.exceptions.ALBPException

  • Packages that use ALBPException 
    Package Description
    dtn.net
    Main package for DTN connections based on JALBP library.
    dtn.net.exceptions
    Exception throwed by JALBP.

      The same as ALBPSocket.setPayloadLocation(ALBPBundlePayloadLocation) followed by receive

      The same as ALBPSocket.setTimeout(int) followed by receive

      Sends a Bundle through the DTN connection
